title: I could use some RP so i created this
body:
So I recently bought some RP and after spending some im left with 300RP and im 50RP short from an emote, so im asking if Rioter could accept this creation for some RP.
https://imgur.com/a/y8qMP
Btw that's my cat if anyone is wondering

replies.body:
Whelp, I guess dis cat is my senpai now. 

Be sure to check your RP totals next time you login ^_^
